author: Football Italia staff
title: Juve: Rabiot returns to France
description: Juventus midfielder Adrien Rabiot has returned to France for the remainder of the lockdown period in Italy.  	Training in sporting facilities has been outlawed until at least April 13 on the peninsula, while Serie A will not recommence until the summer.
content:
Juventus midfielder Adrien Rabiot has returned to France for the remainder of the lockdown period in Italy.
Training in sporting facilities has been outlawed until at least April 13 on the peninsula, while Serie A will not recommence until the summer.
